content: 在另一个世界有另一个你，它的故事因你而改变。智能体世界开启属于你们的文明旅程。新的冒险，从外貌到性格全由你来创造。Nti省时master精细，现在就让你的世界开始运转。智能体诞生后，你的一句话就能定方向、改路径。升级住所，推进职业，改变命运。想知道智能体在想什么？Game mode观察行为与心理。Data mode查看关系、价格和排名，帮他们做出更高收益的决策。每个智能体各自生活，与他们交谈，聆听内心的回响。翻开面板细读状态、行囊、职业与日记。在这片像素大陆，每个智能体的决定源自多层次的AI框架。从个体到世界，数据记录着文明的每一步成长。更多建筑等你和智能体一步步解锁。唤醒城市，迎接未知的冒险与故事。智能体世界不只是游戏，它是你与另一个自己共同创造文明的开始。

key_facts: FACT: In another world, an alternate version of the user exists whose story is shaped by the user's choices.
FACT: The Agent World allows users to embark on a civilization-building journey with customizable avatars.
FACT: Users can create characters from appearance to personality traits in the Agent World.
FACT: The Nti省时master system enables efficient management and automation of the world's development.
FACT: After an agent is born, a single user command can alter its direction or life path.
FACT: Users can upgrade housing, advance careers, and change life outcomes for agents.
FACT: Game mode allows observation of agent behavior and psychological states.
FACT: Data mode provides insights into relationships, prices, and rankings to optimize decisions.
FACT: Each agent lives independently and interacts with the environment and other agents.
FACT: Users can communicate with agents and access their inner thoughts through dialogue.
FACT: The agent interface displays status, inventory, career, and personal diary entries.
FACT: The pixel-based world operates under a multi-layered AI framework governing agent decisions.
FACT: The system records data at both individual and societal levels to track civilizational progress.
FACT: New buildings are progressively unlocked as users and agents advance together.
FACT: The world evolves through player-driven actions, enabling dynamic storytelling and exploration.
key_opinions: OPINION: The Agent World transforms gaming into a deeply personal experience of co-creating civilization.
OPINION: The ability to shape an alternate self’s destiny offers profound emotional engagement.
OPINION: The integration of psychology and data modes enhances strategic depth and immersion.
OPINION: The system’s automation features make long-term world-building accessible to casual players.
OPINION: The narrative potential of agent-driven stories surpasses traditional game structures.
OPINION: The pixel aesthetic enhances nostalgia while supporting complex AI interactions.
OPINION: The focus on individual agency empowers users to feel truly responsible for world outcomes.
OPINION: The blend of creativity and analytics creates a unique hybrid experience between simulation and storytelling.
OPINION: The world feels alive because agents react realistically to user input and environmental changes.
OPINION: The diary and state tracking systems deepen character connection and narrative continuity.
key_datapoints: DATA: Agents operate under a multi-layered AI decision-making framework.
DATA: User commands can immediately redirect an agent’s life path after creation.
DATA: Housing upgrades and career progression are key milestones in agent development.
DATA: Game mode enables real-time behavioral and psychological observation of agents.
DATA: Data mode reveals relationship dynamics, market prices, and performance rankings.
DATA: The world evolves through incremental unlocking of new buildings and systems.
DATA: Each agent maintains independent life cycles with unique goals and behaviors.
DATA: Player interaction influences both individual agent trajectories and collective civilization growth.
DATA: The system tracks every decision and outcome across multiple levels of society.
DATA: The interface includes detailed panels for status, inventory, career, and personal diary.
